author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Imagica Robot Holdings to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Imagica Robot Holdings Inc
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 1.2 million shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between Feb. 16 and Feb. 22
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 10,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/nD2JE2
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
